title: Tomato and Hearts of Palm Salad
directions: Combine tomatoes, hearts of palm, red onion and parsley in a large bowl. In a small bowl, mix the vegetable oil, vinegar, sugar and salt and pepper until sugar is dissolved. Pour vinaigrette over tomato mixture and gently mix. Add more salt and pepper to taste. Serve at room temperature.
ingredients: 3 cups cherry tomatoes, sliced in half
1 15-ounce can hearts of palm, drained and sliced into ¼ inch rings
¼ cup thinly sliced or shaved red onion
½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
